channel.title: You Installed Mods!
channel.description:
Post your installed mods! I currently have these following mods installed:
[ul][li]Zan's Minimap 1.4_01[/li] [li]Too Many Items 1.4_01[/li][/ul]

item.title: You Installed Mods!
item.dc:creator: @normanosbourne normanosbourne
item.description:
@normanosbourne wrote:

zans minimap… this is pointless. why not add "state the reason you chose/like the mod.

Read full topic

item.title: You Installed Mods!
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

I’m using these mods:
BuildCraft 2.0.
IndustrialCraft.
Better than wolves.
Redstone enhanced.
Millenaire NPC village.
Npc workers.
Zeppelin.
Zipline mod.
MCExtended.
Zans minimap.
Single player commands.
Forge.
Modloader and modloaderMP.

Had some compatibility issues at first when I tried to play them all together, so I had to decompile IC and change some stuff. Shhh don’t tell the mod author.

Read full topic

item.title: You Installed Mods!
item.dc:creator: @DebilitationMC DebilitationMC
item.description:
@DebilitationMC wrote:

[quote=“durial12, post:4, topic:391092”]Zan’s Minimap
Misa190 texture pack (128x128 or 64x64, I can’t remember)

What does Too many Items do?[/quote]

Here broskie - http://www.minecraftforum.net/viewtopic.php?t=152174

That’s what the “Too Many Items” mod is

Read full topic

item.title: You Installed Mods!
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

[quote=“Tom_BETA, post:6, topic:391092”][quote author=noobs are ftw link=topic=487041.msg3569840#msg3569840 date=1302960974]
Optifog
Faithful 32x32 texture pack
Too many items
Single player commands
More creeps and weirdos
Modloader(of course)
Planes v9
[/quote]

What does optifog do? And planes v9?[/quote]

optifog modifies the render distance thing and gives you a higher fps rate while planes you can fly with(there is an smp version of it if you wanna add it)

Read full topic
